text: Donald's Garden is a 1942 animated short film featuring Donald Duck. It was released by Walt Disney Productions. ==Plot== Donald has a garden with lots of melons. A gopher comes and eats the melons, and Donald tries to stop him. ==Voice cast== *Clarence Nash as Donald Duck ==Home media== The short was released on December 6, 2005 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Two: 1942-1946. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Donald Duck
title: Donald's Garden
